item.title: Leveraging Visual Tokens for Extended Text Contexts in Multi-Modal Learning
item.description: Visual tokens boost long-text multi-modal models!

item.title: LOVA3: Learning to Visual Question Answering, Asking and Assessment
item.description: LOVA¬≥ enhances MLLMs by teaching them to ask and assess image-based questions, improving their multimodal understanding and performance on various benchmarks.

item.title: One Token to Seg Them All: Language Instructed Reasoning Segmentation in Videos
item.description: VideoLISA: A video-based multimodal large language model enabling precise, language-instructed video object segmentation with superior performance.
